name: Cake Ninja 3: The Legend Continues
overview: It is simple, fun and very challenging! Cake Ninja 3: The Legend Continues is the sequel to the very popular casual game, Cake Ninja, which was among the TOP 20 of the best-selling Nintendo 3DS™ games. Slide the stylus across the screen to slice cakes into small pieces like a true Ninja warrior. Game Features: 6 challenging game modes (4 single player, 2 multiplayer) A collection of bonuses (shuriken, bounce, slow and more ) Unlockable achievements Internet Rankings
